scripts.dev: vite dev # start the Vite dev server
scripts.build: vite build # build the production bundle
scripts.preview: vite preview # preview the production build locally
scripts.prepare: svelte-kit sync || echo '' # generate SvelteKit types (pnpm/yarn hook)
scripts.check: svelte-kit sync && svelte-check --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json # typecheck the project
scripts.check:watch: svelte-kit sync && svelte-check --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json --watch # typecheck in watch mode
scripts.lint: prettier --check . && eslint . # run Prettier check then ESLint
scripts.tracker:copy: cp -r ./tracker-dsp/pkg/* ./src/lib/tracker-wasm/ # copy tracker DSP wasm artifacts into app
scripts.go:build: cd go-engine && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg --release # build Rust Go engine to wasm pkg/
scripts.go:copy: rm -rf ./src/lib/go-wasm && mkdir -p ./src/lib/go-wasm && cp go-engine/pkg/* ./src/lib/go-wasm/ # copy Go wasm artifacts into app
scripts.go:wasm: npm run go:build && npm run go:copy # rebuild and sync Go wasm into the app
